Screenwriter: Léa Mysius, Paul Guilhaume, Léa Mysius, Paul Guilhaume
Production Co: F Comme Film, Trois Brigands Productions
Synopsis: Eight-year-old Vicky has a mysterious gift: she can recreate any scent she comes across, even that of her beloved mother Joanne. When her estranged aunt suddenly returns to town, the invocation of her fragrance plunges the young girl back in time to unravel a past replete with family secrets and queer romance.
Title: The Five Devils
